title: After entering client, LoL crushes my laptop entirely
body:
After entering client, less than 1 minutes, my computer gets completely closed and It doesn't even reset. Just gets closed.

I will be honest. I had a driver problem today and for 9 hours, add or take, I have worked on it. I'm actually pretty shit at computer so I may fucked up things. And though seems like my primary problem was AMD SATA Controller driver, I wasn't aware of it. For that reason I have updated many drivers. 

What could be the problem? If it is about drivers (high likely it is), which driver could be the issue? Graphics card driver? I really don't know and I desperately need help, otherwise I may fuck up more.

replies.body: Hmmmmm....it sounds like something may have gone pretty wrong when you were altering those drivers if simply starting League now causes your entire pc to crash. I don't want this to get any worse, so let's go ahead and have you get in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Try your best to let them know everything you've done with these drivers already, and they should be able to guide you in the right direction.
